questions.question: Who is the protagonist of Naruto?
questions.fact: Naruto is a jinchūriki hosting the Nine-Tailed Fox.

questions.question: What is Naruto’s signature technique?
questions.fact: Naruto can create hundreds of physical clones due to his chakra reserves.

questions.question: Which tailed beast is sealed inside Naruto?
questions.fact: Kurama is the Nine-Tailed Fox.

questions.question: Who was the Fourth Hokage?
questions.fact: Minato sacrificed himself to seal Kurama inside Naruto.

questions.question: What ideology drives the Akatsuki’s actions?
questions.fact: Pain believed suffering would unite the world.

questions.question: Who is the main protagonist of Jujutsu Kaisen?
questions.fact: Yuji becomes Sukuna’s vessel after eating a cursed finger.

questions.question: Who is considered the strongest jujutsu sorcerer?
questions.fact: Gojo possesses both the Six Eyes and Limitless.

questions.question: What cursed technique does Gojo use for his domain expansion?
questions.fact: It overloads opponents with infinite information.

questions.question: Which curse is responsible for widespread human transfiguration?
questions.fact: Mahito manipulates souls directly.

questions.question: What event fundamentally shifts the power balance of the series?
questions.fact: Gojo’s sealing changes the entire jujutsu world.

questions.question: Who is the protagonist of Hunter x Hunter?

questions.question: Which Nen category does Killua belong to?
questions.fact: Killua transmutes aura into electricity.

questions.question: Who leads the Phantom Troupe?
questions.fact: Chrollo steals and uses others’ Nen abilities.

questions.question: What sacrifice does Gon make to defeat Neferpitou?
questions.fact: Gon’s transformation costs him nearly everything.

questions.question: Who is humanity’s strongest soldier?

questions.question: Which anime uses Nen as a power system?

questions.question: Which anime explores inherited memory across generations?

questions.question: Who is Naruto’s lifelong rival?

questions.question: What clan is known for the Sharingan?
